title: Elevate (xyz.techitout.elevate)
description: Managable settings for the Elevate app (https://github.com/robjschroeder/Elevate)

elevationDurationMinutes.title: Elevation duration in minutes
elevationDurationMinutes.description: The number of minutes in which a user should be elevated to Admin

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: This is the path to an icon used by the dialog prompts

jamfProPolicyCustomEvent.title: Jamf Pro Policy Custom Event
jamfProPolicyCustomEvent.description: If you would like to have Jamf Pro run a policy after Elevate, add the custom trigger of the policy here

removeAdminRights.title: Remove Admin Rights
removeAdminRights.description: If set to true, Elevate will remove admin rights for all users. If set to false, Elevate will not run on admin users

webhookURL.title: WebHook URL
webhookURL.description: If set, Elevate can send a notification via webhook to Teams or Slack when a user elevates
